title: Intelligent Services JourneyAI Engagement Scores
description: This mixin contains JourneyAI Engagement Scores, which provides individual customer's propensities to engage with a message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Journey AI
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Journey AI intelligent service provides various insights about message deliveries along customer's journey.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Engagement Scores
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Journey AI engagement scores provide likelihoods of a customer engaging with a newly delivered message.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Email Engagement Scores
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Engagement scores here are for email channel messages.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Click Engagement Score
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: This score represents the probability for a customer to click on links in an email.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Open Engagement Score
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: This score represents the probability of a customer to open an email.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Retention Level
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Retention level is a qualitative categorization of customer's likelihood of staying subscribed to the email list.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Retention Percent Rank
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Retention percent rank is a percentile rank of the likelihood of staying subscribed to the email list.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Unsubscription Probability
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: Unsubscription probability is the probability of a recipient to unsubscribe from email channel conditioned on email opened.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.title: Engagement Scores Info
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/intellig.description: This information contains engagement scores model version and scoring date as a concatenated string, e.g. v1.3.0_2020-11-04.
